div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 109 Charakas, east of Gortyna, Crete, 1963 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (Oeconomides) Contents: 71+ AR Aegina: 1 st. (4th cent.) Stymphalus: 1 st. Aptera: 2 st. Chersonesus: 5 st. Cnossus: 15 st. Cydonia: 3 st. Eleutherna: 1 st. Gortyna: 13 st. Itanus: 1 st. Lyttus: 11 st. Phaestus: 7 st. Phalasarna: 1 st. Polyrhenium: 2 st. Praesus: 3 st. Priansus: 1 st. Rhaucus: 3 st. Tylisus: 1 st. Disposition: Herakleion Alexiou, A Delt 1964, Chronika, p. 443 Le Rider, Monn. cr√©t., p. 224 To be published by M. Oeconomides
